markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thrown 20 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=195" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 280 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Favored Weapon** [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72), [Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=244), [Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=63), [Chamidu](/Deities.aspx?ID=188), [Ghlaunder](/Deities.aspx?ID=36), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=105), [Mammon](/Deities.aspx?ID=68), [Ra](/Deities.aspx?ID=57), [Set](/Deities.aspx?ID=242), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=48), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159), [Xhamen-Dor](/Deities.aspx?ID=165)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 1 sp

**Damage** 1d6 P

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Category** Simple

**Group** [Spear](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=14)
</row>

</column>

---

A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-14" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Anchor Spear](/Equipment.aspx?ID=654), [Deepdread Claw](/Equipment.aspx?ID=768), [Fulminating Spear](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1087), [Gluttonous Spear](/Equipment.aspx?ID=788), [Golden Blade of Mzali](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1449)
name: Spear
